website_summaries.verdict: Ideal as a student or rehearsal violin, but has the tone of a basic performance model.
pros: Better tone than typical student models
Pegs hold tuning very well, including the sometimes problematic E string
Includes many accessories, and ready to play almost right out of the box
cons: Strings may be off-center upon arrival
Does not include a tuner, instruction book, or shoulder rest

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased so far
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased so far. I purchased this violin for my 12 yr old daughter. It arrived promptly and in excellent condition. All I had to do was adjust the fine tuners slightly, and rosin up the bow. She has practiced on it twice, and I still have not needed to touch the pegs. Stays in tune. She loves the case because the straps allow her to wear as a backpack. The sound is much better than I thought it would be; it is very deep and loud when compared to my violin I have been playing for over 30 years. If you are considering making this purchase you should add it to your cart with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: J. Whitney

customer_reviews.title: I love it. My first violin
customer_reviews.text: I love it. My first violin. Arrived in a case. With most of the accessories for the beginner. However, the bow had some frey to the hairs and the violin had a slight scratch on it. I know this was impossible for it to have during the shipping process. The product was well packed. Well secured in the case with a cover on top of it in the case for protection. Evidently who ever packed the violin did not care about the scratch on the product. Or the condition of the bow. But this is not the end of the world. I was please with the rest of the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Starlette Marie Topa

customer_reviews.title: Best student violin in this price range.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a quality student violin and you don't want to spend $500 or more, buy this violin. We have purchased other brands. This violin is lovely. It sounds so much better than the other violins in the same price range. I am extremely happy with it and wish that I had bought this one first instead of the other ones that are sold as package deals on here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent violin, and the customer service is even better.
customer_reviews.text: I got a 1/2 size outfit for my son. Even though I don't know much about violin, the quality seems to be very good. But my review is mostly about the customer service. After using it for more than a year, my son dropped the bow, and it broke. I contacted the store through email and explained the situation. I didn't expect they would do anything about it. To my surprise, even though the warranty on the bow is only 1 year, they decided to send me a brand new bow anyway. It came in a very sturdy package, and we're very happy about it. We'd definitely be a return customer.
customer_reviews.author: Shenanig

customer_reviews.title: nice violin outfit 1/2 size
customer_reviews.text: cant complain about this 1/2 size violin for the price. i went round and round about buying or renting. sure i could accumulate money for a full size instrument if i rent, but i figured i would buy this and donate it to my daughters school when she moves up a size. many parents just do not have the cash to buy or rent an instrument for their child. so i look at it as giving quite a few children over the years an opportunity to learn to make music. cant put a price tag on that. i just wish kennedy violins gave you the option of a glass bow for a little extra cash over the wood bow.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kazlowski

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My mother-in-law wanted a vilion because she played one when she was younger and order one from internet for like $40 well it's wasn't built worth what she payed for at all so she asked me to find one better so I asked her what the top out she was willing to spend she said $200.00 I explain to her that it might be a little more than that but honestly if you want to play music it's never cheap , I found this one and she's having a blast learning how to play once more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service and included setup
customer_reviews.text: Being the first violin I've ever owned and really played, I can't really say much about it relative quality. Still, it sounds great to me. Good construction and aesthetic, though with some minor defects that a real connoisseur might find fault with - though I am not that kind of person. The instrument came fully set up, nearly fully tuned, and the bow seemed dusty (meaning that it was conveniently rosined surprisingly). The customer service and warranty actually exceed my expectations. My only qualm, really, is that I can't tell the true origin of this violin.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Beginners+
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my Daughter who is in 7th grade. This is an upgrade from a 1/2 violin and was a much needed upgrade as she outgrew her other violin quickly. I was not ready to pop for an expensive violin as we are trying to feel out her interest to see if she wants to continue to play. The durability of this product is outstanding and the bundle with case, etc. gives her everything she needs. Would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners and enthusiasts
customer_reviews.text: Started playing violin when I was 5 with the Suzuki program. Played with orchestras through college, but dropped off when work and life got in the way. Bought this now that things have settled down and am loving it. Great sound and really great value. Even as long as it has been since I played regularly, this helps me sound great.
customer_reviews.author: W Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Great student violin
customer_reviews.text: Why spend a boatload of money until you can actually play the thing. LOL .. as best I know this is a great starter violin. To improve it you can get the bridge and better strings installed by a local pro and that will dramatically improve sound quality and play-ability. .. my two cents... well actually a couple hundred .. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Daxx

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my daughter. She loves it. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. She loves it. We did have the metal clamp come loose on the bow, and either the bow strings are very weak or my daughter (new player) is hard on it, but her violin teacher is suggesting a new bow already due to losing so may strings (I don't think they're horse hair anymore... who knows).
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Stone

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful instrument and sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this violin. The only flaw was a small dent on the front that can only be seen at a certain angle.
customer_reviews.author: K. Shea

customer_reviews.title: A so so violin
customer_reviews.text: We have the violin for 1.5 years with light usage as my son was focus on piano public exam. He has started to play more of it just these 2 - 3 months and discovered the sound is not that good, and his teacher found out that the nut has to be replaced and the bridge needs to be adjusted. Well, I understand the bridge may not be the seller's problem, but how about the nut? the string cut through the nut a little bit ... we got another teacher to check the nut, and she also said the same.
customer_reviews.author: Super Big Cat

customer_reviews.title: Quality builtand superior service.
customer_reviews.text: I love that it was set up before shipping. The sound is great. The accessories thrown in was a bonus. The wood is beautiful and bow is of high quality. A student wouldn't have to upgrade for many years. My instructer was impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Miller

customer_reviews.title: great instrument, not so great case
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. I love the violin itself. Out of the box, the G string was damaged but that was okay, there were extra strings provided. My 9yr old told me to make sure to mention that the string cloth was not provided. The reason I knocked off a star is because of the case. The part where the rosin goes does not close flush. Also after using it a few days with the shoulder straps (our preferred method since we walk a long time with the violin), it looks like the part holding the straps is going to break off of the case. So, violin= great, case= not so great, in our opinion
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used instrument
customer_reviews.text: The violin arrived damaged. The wood on the back was split with a quarter inch gap. The rosin was dried out and the reed on the bow was tattered. I would not recommend this item to anyone. In addition to paying for the cost of the violin, I'll be paying for repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wasn’t very smart and bought a much cheaper violin at first because ...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t very smart and bought a much cheaper violin at first because I was scared I wouldn’t be able to pick up the violin as an adult learner and didn’t want to spend too much. I ended up returning that violin after the string snapped almost immediately. Then I found this violin. They sound like completely different instruments. I know this sticker price can worry some, but the Kennedy violin is worth it. Already tuned for you and ready to play, so you don’t have to worry about setting it up. Thanks so much for my violin!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much better that expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as my first violin. I got the "clearance" one because it was cheaper. The description states it will have blemishes but you would be hard pressed to find one on this violin. I thought I had a problem with the bridge and called customer service, Representative was very helpful (turns out there is nothing wrong with the violin). Brought it to work to show it to a coworker that played violin in college. He was very impressed with the violin and said it played very well. I look forward to learning to play with this violin. It is supposed to be a "starter" but with the quality I may just hang on to it
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Great value, quality student violin.
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I went with Kennedy Violins and the Bunnel student kit. My daughter loves it, she had her first class ever tonight and the teacher was impressed with the tone. Everything that was included was there, the tuner is on point, and even though we bought the clearance kit I couldn't tell you what the finish mistake is. Thank you for a great product to make the start of her music lessons a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great product for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter (Age 11) who has been playing smaller size violins for some years. We love the quality and sound. I didn't notice any cosmetic defects as stated. It looks perfect and we love the sound. Great product for the beginners. I play a violin made in Germany worth a few grants and of course you cannot expect the same quality. The seller is also provided very professional service on the broken Rosin. Received a new one within 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Pkruse45

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely an okay violin and was packaged well. We really couldn't find any flaws or defects with it but ours did not come with rosin and the violin wasn't even remotely close to being tuned properly. So I'm not super pleased with the purchase but not devastated either. It was supposed to include rosin and be tuned and it didn't and wasn't, so my review is just "meh".
customer_reviews.author: Magnificent Rogue

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sounding instrument
customer_reviews.text: We were very impressed with the instrument. After having been disappointed by an earlier order, which was likely mass produced without seeing a violinist's hands, I wanted to make sure the violin was first looked at and played by someone who knows what to look for. The violin came roughly tuned, the bow with rosin. The kit had everything to get me started teaching my daughter. She's already fell in love with her new violin.
customer_reviews.author: Montri Wongworawat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been renting for over a year now and decided I was committed enough for a violin of my own. After reading great reviews I decided on a Kennedy violin. I am beyond happy that I did. I also want to thank Amazon for taking care with my delivery. I had feared UPS would treat my package like an ordinary one, not realizing it was a violin. I watched a van pull up and carefully deliver my package. I am impressed! It’s fully assembled, beautiful and ready to play. I did not realize the poor quality of my rental until I played my new one. If I can find an excuse to buy another one I definitely would. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: R.M.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Kennedy Violins FTW! Thank you so much for your amazing dedication to violins and the customer. The quality of product and thoughtful approach to presentation of the violin is quite masterful! When you open the box and violin case you can immediately see the care and dedication of Kennedy Violins. Using the material that came with the it and the Trala app, I was able dive back into learning the violin! Yay! If your looking for a great violin and a great company to get it from, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Jasin

customer_reviews.title: My 12 year old LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks just as good as the picture! I bought this for my 12 year old daughter, who's going into 7th grade. This will be her 4th year in orchastra so she is accustomed to how the violin should feel and sound. So far she loves both the violin and the case. She also said it sounds just as good as the one we had been renting, but adds that the shoulder rest is Soooooo much better! Making it MUCH more comfortable to play!
customer_reviews.author: Mica-Marie Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for price. Item as described and great email customer service, (I had a question about the warranty) this was perfect for our kid who is in between sizes and will need a bigger one in the next couple years. I would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes it . It came fast it was beautiful packed and presented . I don’t play it so I can’t tell how good it is but it’s great for my daughter who is a beginner. Price is great !
customer_reviews.author: Madlen Dye

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my sister. She wanted an instrument to begin taking lessons and this far exceeded my expectations. I know nothing about violins but was impressed by the quality of this one. She loves it and has been very pleased with it. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: msgirl08

customer_reviews.title: I'm A newbie
customer_reviews.text: I don't know anything about violins so I can't judge sound quality or if it is a good beginner violin but the value seemed good to me. I just got it in today and again while I know nothing about the various craftsmanship it is a pretty instrument to me and I look forward to my journey with it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Nice Instrument and Accessories
customer_reviews.text: Complete violin outfit for an excellent price. It was nice to see that this violin came with everything a beginner would need to start playing: a bow, extra strings, rosin, cloth, and case. Individual notes sound lovely. It's too bad I stink at playing right now. I'm looking forward to developing some skill and exploring the potential in this violin.
customer_reviews.author: Mama of six

customer_reviews.title: I really love this violin but I ordered a 3/4 and just ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love this violin but I ordered a 3/4 and just found out today that it is a 4/4....much too big for my daughter. Haven't contacted Kennedy Violins yet but definitely check the size of your violin when you receive it. I had to purchase a rental for her lessons and purchased this violin to avoid renting. Oh well.....guess I'll be playing violin too.
customer_reviews.author: Wyldmum

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully done!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I'm blown away by the quality of this violin. This is my second one I have purchased. The case, the bow, the violin, everything. I have played for years and have owned expensive vintage German violins. This is amazing for the cost. I would by 10 more, save up, and by 10 more. Well done! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Hellmansauce

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for beginners; most for your money
customer_reviews.text: The violin arrived before the expected date and in perfect condition. I ordered the clearance due to small cosmetic mishaps but don't notice any deformities. The extras are all very helpful, especially as I am a new violinist and do not know exactly what I may need. The sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Reinhard

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Violin!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful violin for a beginner or an intermediate player! Lightweight and well-constructed. The violin comes with a high-quality bow, case with humidity monitor, rosin, extra strings, and cloth. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Ready to go right out of the case.
customer_reviews.text: The violin came as expected in a lovely and sturdy case. It was ready to play as soon as it was opened. The little touches for this level were nice to see. I was more than pleased with the item and would suggest this to others looking for a good beginning violin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it looks and sound great. I'm looking forward to more lessons with it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to spend too much on a violin since I wasn't sure how I'd do and stick with it. When I opened the case, I was pleasantly surprised and the only blemish that I could see was where there isn't much varnish on the bottom of the neck. Other than that it looks and sound great. I'm looking forward to more lessons with it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Guitar guy, seems nice.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I'm a guitar guy, so I don't know a lot about violins but it seems fairly nice. Packaging was fantastic, nice big bubble wrap between the box and case etc. I really like everything about the instrument and the case itself. I wish it would have come with a shoulder rest, but I knew up front that it didn't so I can't ding them for a star because of it. I'm not sure how cheaper instruments stack up against this, and I can't judge the sound as i'm only learning. in any case I'm sure it'll be more than sufficient for at least several years of practice before I (hopefully!) outgrow it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful beginner’s violin set. Prompt delivery, well packaged, and even received an email from Kennedy Violins offering assistance if needed. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Great starter violin!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who was starting lessons. I wanted something that was not cheap, decent quality, and not too expensive. It has turned out to work well for our needs. My son loves playing it. We did order an additional shoulder rest, and there was already a spot in the case to hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: He loves his new violin and love the case came with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 11 year old son. He loves his new violin and love the case came with it. He was bragging about it after he gets back from school about how he feel special for having a nicer violin than most of the kids. The customer service is great and I love everything about it! If he decided to go further on his journey in violins we will definitely consider Kennedy Violins again!
customer_reviews.author: Blooming Onion

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes this violin. One drawback is that one string has a hard time staying in tune. There is a simple fix but it seems like we do it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Ken B

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you intend to actually play it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if the violin I received was just a bad apple, but it is terrible. Weak neck and can't be tuned, get one string in the e and move to next but the added tension of adjustment of the second causes the previous to drop out of tune. Cosmetically fine, beautiful piece, great as a novelty display but nothing more... Angry at myself for wasting my money..
customer_reviews.author: Richard D.

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I want to learn to play the violin. Everything was perfect when it arrived, and violin was in tune. Within 20 minutes I was playing Twinkle Twinkle Little Star. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SM (USA)

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this violin on a whim and fell in love with it. I have only had it for a couple of weeks, but I am learning how to play it on my own, and it's starting to sound like I know what I'm doing. The musicians at Kennedy Violins have been really helpful and sent me a lot of things to start my violin career, including phone numbers and emails to contact with any questions, a beginner music book, etc. I love it and I am so thrilled with it. Great for beginners! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Farber

customer_reviews.title: Good instrument, electric tuner arrived broken and wrong size shoulder rest
customer_reviews.text: The violin itself is wonderful and worth the price, but the extras were disappointing. The electric tuner only works if I pry off the back and press hard on the battery (not included and it’s an expensive cell kind) and I was sent the wrong size shoulder rest (I played violin for 12 years and have taken the last 9 off so this was definitely not me being able to figure it out). At its fully expanded it did only reached about 3/4 across the way of the body. Had to go out and buy the correct size shoulder rest. But for a starter violin, the instrument is very good and beautiful, really good sound for a starter.
customer_reviews.author: Norah Solano

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer here
customer_reviews.text: My kid is very happy using this violin...good purchase..high quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter has been using be this violin since we bought it with no problems so far. Very good quality. Looks beautiful as well.
customer_reviews.author: kevin and Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great violin, tuner sucks
customer_reviews.text: Loved the violin only reason I gave it a 4 star is the tuner is junk bought a fender tuner to replace it. But the violin is awesome a perfect beginner violin and reasonable priced. I would advise geting some peg drops it helps alot to tune.
customer_reviews.author: cole

customer_reviews.title: Beginner
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional, I am a beginner and excited for this new journey. It arrived in a timely manner. Kennedy Violins added a lot of extra information and they seem to be very helpful if anything were to go wrong. The violin is beautiful & I see no defects or anything wrong with it, so whatever it was (for it to be on clearance) I don’t see it or notice it. I will come back and edit as I get my practice going and everything . (:
customer_reviews.author: jakieepivaral

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful violin. It looks and sounds great
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful violin. It looks and sounds great. This is my first instrument but I know enough to say it is a great deal and a great value. At first I worried that my E string was slipping, then watched several youtube videos about what to do. Unwinding a few turns, then re tightening with some firm pressure on the peg worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hacking

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner, taking lessons with my kindergartner. The teacher was impressed by this instrument for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Although I’m a new student on the violin, I sense that this one is of good quality; sound wise and overall build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Green

customer_reviews.title: My first violin
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful nice sounding violin for a beginner. It was ready to play as soon as I pulled it out of the case.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a good violin, it came with fine tuned. When we opened the box, my daughter can start to play any song. The sound of the violin is great, too. I think it's worth the money. The price is not too high for this quality. I am scared to try something that is too cheap. This price is something I can afford, and I'm happy with what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product and service.
customer_reviews.text: We bought two violins from Kennedy and love them both. It's great having a real brick and mortar store to back them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Bird

customer_reviews.title: Beauty at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several violins, but this one is a thing of beauty, a real work of art! I am very happy with this purchase and would recommend this violin for any serious student.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Violin delivered quickly and is beautiful! This is my first violin
customer_reviews.text: Violin delivered quickly and is beautiful! This is my first violin. My husband purchased it for me to fulfill a long time desire to learn to play.
customer_reviews.author: Boulevard1970

customer_reviews.title: The case and extras make it worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I am not an expert violinist but I can tell this is a very nice violin. I suggest downloading a tuner on your phone though. The one it comes with is a little aggravating to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and excellent customer service Kennedy violins has a customer for life
customer_reviews.text: Got this violin within 2 days of ordering it this is my first violin but my family members who are professional musicians said it's quality and tone are excellent perfect beginner violin holds a tune very well and is beautiful couldn't be happier with it
customer_reviews.author: Nwluce

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the seller as the instunent arrived in record ...
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure, I am not a violinist and know nothing about violins. I purchased this instrument because I do want to learn at some point in the near future (bucket list item). I am very happy with the seller as the instunent arrived in record time, two days after i ordered it. The violin is beautiful and in perfect condition exactly as described as well as the bow, case and accessories. I highly recommend this seller and will certainly consider this seller for future purchases
customer_reviews.author: Norbert Schuble

customer_reviews.title: Clearance doesn't mean bad.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Violin. After having played Trumpet some years ago, I was finally ready to try another instrument. I couldn't be happier. I love the sounds that come from it, (even with my non skilled hands) and it is truly a beautiful instrument. I couldn't recommend this product more!
customer_reviews.author: Eodbro12

customer_reviews.title: The quality and the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is for our daughters violin class. She is so happy with it and looking forward to start using it. Also the company is very accomodating and helpful. We would recommend this to our friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is great quality violin
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is great quality violin. I highly recommend it!! As a beginner violinist I am happy with this violin and after 2 weeks of practicing (MOn-Fri for 1 hour each) I am progressing very well and have had no issues with this violin.
customer_reviews.author: MJR

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price! I've been practicing every day ever since I received it. I'm glad I chose Kennedy Violins.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Le

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty matte finish
customer_reviews.text: Melow sounding violin. I purchased this violin to use while learning to fiddle. I have a German violin also which is much louder, but doesn't hide some of my imperfections while playing as well as the Bunnel does. Very pretty matte finish. Very slight imperfections in the finish, but doesn't effect the beauty of the instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Have been taking lessons since January 2018
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Have been taking lessons since January 2018. I am making progress. My instructor says the violin has good tone.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Keith

customer_reviews.title: very happy, exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Clearance version of this violin and I am very happy with my purchase! The instrument is exactly as described and definitely a great value for the price. I was unable to find any defects that would make this a "clearance" instrument in any way, and so consider myself all the luckier for my purchase. Absolutely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice first violin
customer_reviews.text: My daughter starts violin lessons at middle school this year. This kit contains most of what she needs. My favorite thing is that the case is large enough to include a little "cubby" section for her rosin, shoulder rest, and extra strings. No need to carry extra stuff separately. Very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Came as promised
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful violin! It is my first time owning one but a friend who has played the violin says is amazing. I can’t wait to start learning hot to play this beautiful instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Emely Reimer Wiebe

customer_reviews.title: 10 yr old loves this violin!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old loves the sound of this violin! Tuned and well crafted. A great violin for beginner/intermediate players.
customer_reviews.author: We are the Millers

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully shipped! Excellent condition
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully shipped! Excellent condition! We had to hunt for the cosmetic flaws. The violin was basically in tune when it arrived. Wonderful sound and deep resonance from this lovely beginner violin. We appreciated the education we got from Kennedy Violins website and WILL be buying from them again. Other reviews of Kennedy Violins mentioned previously owned, lower quality violins had had a negative effect on their students, but this one sounds so pretty that if you get a bad sound you know it's an error on your part rather than the violin. Extremely pleased! This is an excellent value for an affordable price. Violin teacher commented on the quality of this outfit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: purchased for my grandson he liked it very much
customer_reviews.text: I do not know any thing about violins, purchased for my grandson he liked it very much. It looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great experience, great product
customer_reviews.text: The violin arrived when expected, with no issues. Lovely instrument. The outreach from the manufacturer was superb. They checked twice, first to make sure everything had arrived okay, then again later to see how I was progressing. Can't say enough nice things. Thanks, Kati!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Got it for my 13 year old daughter and she ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 13 year old daughter and she really likes it. We noticed that the sound is richer than the one she used from the schools.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Walker

customer_reviews.title: New Player
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice instrument. Well packaged. The case is perfect size for my granddaughter. Nice checklist shows what has been done before it was sent. Nice quality violin. Sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Lon Gehrman

customer_reviews.title: Love my new violin
customer_reviews.text: Love my new violin! Imperfections were hard to find - everything was as described. Look forward to years of pleasure with this great instrument!
customer_reviews.author: historyseeker

customer_reviews.title: ... for my daughter (a starter kit) and she's quite happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a gift for my daughter (a starter kit) and she's quite happy with it. A semi-professional violinist helped her set it up and commented that it was a nice violin and had great tone. It came with just about everything needed.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy D. Vickers

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lovely violin for the price. Was even almost perfectly in tune when it arrived
customer_reviews.author: alicia metropolis

customer_reviews.title: It is a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: This violin sounds deep and soft. It is worth to buy! My daughter loves it and it sounds much better rgan the rental ones.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good customer support at Kennedy Violins
customer_reviews.text: All you need to get started or progress. My granddaughter was thinking of quiting because she wasn't regularly getting the school violin,. This violin inspired her to continue ,she really does playwell
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came quick and looks and plays great!! Daughter has been playing for six years. She says it fits comfortably and the sound quality is way better than a school instrument. No noticable imperfections at all. Color came darker than expected, however it looks beautiful and elegant!
customer_reviews.author: william webb

customer_reviews.title: Very nice beginner violin
customer_reviews.text: Violin was quickly shipped in very sturdy packaging. The violin itself is beautiful. Just needed very minor tuning straight out of the box. My daughter is thrilled to finally have her own violin and is looking forward to starting lessons.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition!
customer_reviews.text: The violin was in perfect condition and just perfect for my 6 year old daughter. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Funmilayo Egbeneye

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful instrument delivered in one day...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grand daughter and she was delighted to now have her own instead of a rental. I believe it will inspire her to continue learning. Worth every penny...
customer_reviews.author: Brian Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: New Violin!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have just received my Violin from Bunnel! The quality is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: WMorganTaylor

customer_reviews.title: the tuner is junk
customer_reviews.text: Good violin for beginners with a nice case. But the tuner couldn't work properly and made us break a string. I called the seller and was told that they will mail me a string. But I never got anything from them.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this purchase. The violin I received had nearly unnoticeable imperfections making it a fantastic clearance buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Okura

customer_reviews.title: great value, need better strings
customer_reviews.text: Sounds wonderful for the price, probably the best value out there. You might consider switching to a set of better strings and a better bow. Violin itself is great.
customer_reviews.author: Hiddenbunny

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful violin
customer_reviews.text: Our family does not know how to play the violin but based on the information provided with the violin it seems Kennedy Violins really wants to make sure the instrument and you are satisfied now and throughout the life of the instrument.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: The quaility and care of Kennedy is wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: I am so very pleased with my Kennedy violin. It is all that they said it was and their helpful staff are wonderful. They answer all of my questions. I will definitely stay with Kennedy for all of my future musical purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Price

customer_reviews.title: Sounds better than the student violin we were renting
customer_reviews.text: Sounds better than the student violin we were renting, and will pay for itself within 3 years. Arrived very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Venkman

customer_reviews.title: Few minor defects but excellent violin for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I can see a few dents and scratches and it looks like bridge was added before the polish was done. Otherwise the violin sounds beautiful. Defects don’t effect sound at all and a perfect violin to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It's our second violin we have bought from this company with no problem. Nice violin for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Working Well For This Beginner!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, 5 stars probably doesn't mean much coming from someone who has never really played a violin before. I bought this because I have always loved the violin and have wanted one from childhood. I have started self-taught lessons and it sounds good. It's easy to hold and feels like a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Dayfam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my violin and am greatly enjoying learning how to play.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of instrument, received quickly. Nice sound after basic tuning.
customer_reviews.author: X. GE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 12th grader
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 12th grader. Seems equivalent to the $400 and $500 instruments I was getting ready to purchase at a nearby shop. I don't see the imperfections if there are any. My daughter loves it and it came tuned.
customer_reviews.author: BERNITA M.

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: My son has been playing violin using one we borrowed from my friend. Now, I need to return it, so we decided to buy one for him. We bought this Kennedy because of the great review and compared the sound before we return the other to my friend. The result was amazing. Honestly, I never thought it would make such difference. This Kennedy Violin sounds a lot louder, deeper, and clearer than the other. I'm not a music professional at all, but even I could tell the difference. It's that different. This one sounds more like an intermediate violin that we tried at a local store. I highly recommend this Kennedy Violin.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleMariners

customer_reviews.title: Teacher recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is my very first violin, so I have absolutely no point of reference. However, I asked my future violin teacher which violin I should choose, and she suggested this one. I’m looking forward to learning how to play!!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy W. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very good, with perfect finishing, my son really liked it and keeps saying this violin is awesome and very different from the old one he had.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

product_meta.title: Bunnel Premier Violin Clearance Outfit 4/4 Full Size - Carrying Case and Accessories Included - Highest Quality Solid Maple Wood and Ebony Fittings By Kennedy Violins
feature_bullets: [PROFESSIONALLY SET UP CLEARANCE] The following instrument is listed on clearance due to a slight cosmetic defect that does not affect playability or sound in any way. Our 4/4 full size Bunnel Violin is the upgrade from our Bunnel Pupil violin outfit. It features improved quality of wood, providing a richer, warmer sound and is professionally set up by our experienced luthiers.

[SOLID MAPLE WOOD] Naturally dried maple and tight-grained spruce from the Himalayas are used to build your new 4/4 size violin. Inlaid purfling A custom-fit, high-grade maple bridge, High-grade ebony fittings including polished fingerboard and pegs.

[ACESSORIES INCLUDED] Your Bunnel Premier violin outfit comes with; Portland Carbon fiber Shoulder Rest, Intro to Violin book, KV Clip-on Tuner, Polishing cloth, Backup strings, Giuliani Rosin, Giuliani Brazilwood Bow, and a Portland Oblong carrying case.

[HIGHEST QUALITY VIOLIN] Kennedy Violins is known for having the highest-quality craftsmanship and performance instruments. Playing your music with the best quality violin, as you know, makes all the difference.
[LIFETIME GUARANTEE] All of our Bunnel Pupil Violins are fully backed by a lifetime warranty and a 45-day money-back guarantee. Are you ready to try out your new Kennedy violin outfit?
